description:
A network of 6 trails  of nearly 20 km featuring excellent winter grooming for XC skiing and summer uses of hiking and off-road biking through interpretive trails.  This area winds through boreal forest of Newfoundland and you may see many types of forest critters.  Some of the trails are lit for night skiing.
The ski chalet is open everyday from 9 to 5.
A must do if you're in the area.
NOTE:  GPS data is only the town center, not the trails (yet).
directions: In Pasadena, NL, just about exactly 1/2 way between Corner Brook and Deer Lake on Hiway #1.
title: Pasadena Ski and Nature Park
